## Interactive Chart

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}
require(rCharts)
haireye <- as.data.frame(HairEyeColor)
n1 <- nPlot(Freq ~ Hair, group = 'Eye', type = 'multiBarChart',
    data = subset(haireye, Sex == "Male")
)
n1$print('chart1')
```

--- &interactive

## Interactive Console

```{r opts.label = 'interactive', results = 'asis'}
require(googleVis)
M1 <- gvisMotionChart(Fruits, idvar = 'Fruit', timevar = 'Year')
print(M1, tag = 'chart')
```

## Interactive Chart with Shiny Controls
<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
     $(".draggable").draggable();
});
</script>

```{r opts.label = 'shiny'}
slidifyUI(
  absolutePanel(id = "controls", class = "modal", fixed = TRUE, draggable = TRUE,  top = 60, left = "auto", right = 20, bottom = "auto",  width = 330, height = "auto",
    selectInput('sex', 'Choose Sex', c('Male', 'Female')),
    selectInput('type', 'Choose Type',
      c('multiBarChart', 'multiBarHorizontalChart')
    )
  ),
  mainPanel(
    tags$div(id = 'nvd3plot', class='shiny-html-output nvd3 rChart')
  )
)
```

--- &interactive

## Interactive Console

```{r opts.label = 'interactive', results = 'asis'}
require(rCharts)
a <- Highcharts$new()
a$chart(type = "spline")
a$series(data = c(1, 3, 2, 4, 5, 4, 6, 2, 3, 5, NA), dashStyle = "longdash")
a$series(data = c(NA, 4, 1, 3, 4, 2, 9, 1, 2, 3, 4), dashStyle = "shortdot")
a$legend(symbolWidth = 80)
a$print('chart3')
```
